statements: SELECT * FROM EmergencyData;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM EmergencyData;
SELECT event_location, casualties FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_type = 'Fire';
SELECT * FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_location, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM EmergencyData GROUP BY event_location;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_type = 'Fire' OR event_type = 'Flood' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_type, event_location FROM EmergencyData WHERE casualties > 5 ORDER BY event_location ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location, rescue_teams_dispatched FROM EmergencyData WHERE casualties BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, event_type FROM EmergencyData GROUP BY event_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emergency_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM emergency_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM emergency_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_responders;
SELECT name, department, email FROM incident_responders WHERE department = 'Fire Department';
SELECT * FROM emergency_incidents WHERE location = 'City Center'
SELECT incident_date, location, incident_type FROM emergency_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT name, department, phone_number FROM incident_responders WHERE department = 'Fire Department'
SELECT * FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM emergency_incidents GROUP BY incident_type
SELECT * FROM EmergencyEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_type, location FROM EmergencyEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT responder_id, responder_name, responder_type, deployment_date FROM EmergencyResponders WHERE department = 'Fire Department';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, event_date, location, event_description FROM EmergencyEvents WHERE event_type = 'Fire' OR event_type = 'Flood';
SELECT * FROM EmergencyEvents WHERE event_type='Fire' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, location FROM EmergencyEvents WHERE event_type='Flood' AND location='New York' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT e.event_type, r.responder_name, i.report_date FROM EmergencyEvents e INNER JOIN EmergencyResponders r ON e.event_id = r.responder_id INNER JOIN IncidentReports i ON e.event_id = i.event_id WHERE e.event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY i.report_date DESC;

SELECT e.event_type, r.responder_type, i.report_description FROM EmergencyEvents e LEFT JOIN EmergencyResponders r ON e.event_id = r.responder_id LEFT JOIN IncidentReports i ON e.event_id = i.event_id WHERE i.responder_id IS NULL;
SELECT e.event_id, r.responder_id, i.report_id FROM EmergencyEvents e CROSS JOIN EmergencyResponders r CROSS JOIN IncidentReports i WHERE e.location != 'Houston';
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, caller_location FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type='Fire';
SELECT * FROM response_team WHERE team_members > 5;
SELECT team_name, availability_status FROM response_team WHERE team_lead='John Smith';
SELECT resource_name, resource_quantity FROM resources ORDER BY resource_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls ORDER BY call_date DESC, call_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT caller_name, caller_location FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type='Fire' AND call_date='2022-03-15';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM response_team WHERE team_members > 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_type='Accident' AND incident_location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_quantity FROM resources WHERE resource_location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergencies ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, location, severity FROM emergencies WHERE severity > 3
SELECT event_name, description FROM emergencies WHERE location='New York'
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM response_teams ORDER BY team_size DESC
SELECT resource_name, quantity, location FROM resources
SELECT * FROM emergencies WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM emergencies WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM response_teams ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT incident_id, team_id, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE status = 'closed';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, description FROM event_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
